sentences.en: A garland of flowers had been wreathed round his head.
A simple yellow garment and a garland of wild-flowers are all the ornaments they require.
sentences.cn: 一件朴素的黄衫，一个野花扎成的花环，就是他们所需要的全部装饰。

sentences.en: Garland tried to appear casual, but he couldn't conquer his unease.
sentences.cn: 加兰努力装出无所谓的样子，可是他没法克服自己的局促不安。

sentences.en: He took the garland from my neck and went away.
sentences.cn: 他取下我颈上的花环就走开了.

sentences.en: I saw that my garland of overnight was still hanging loose from your hair.
sentences.cn: 我看见，昨夜我为你编结的花环依然松松地垂在你的发上。

sentences.en: In the others a series of dramatic situations were strung on a thread of melody; this was a garland of songs with just a thread of dramatic plot running through.
sentences.cn: 在头两个里，一系列戏剧性的场景，是串在一根歌曲的线上；而在这一个里，一花环的歌曲，只用一个戏剧情节的线头贯穿。

sentences.en: It is then decorated with lights, garland, and ornaments.
sentences.cn: 然后,装饰灯, 花环和饰物.

sentences.en: It was he who had cajoled Garland into doing the film.
sentences.cn: 是他劝服嘉兰拍这部片子的。

sentences.en: It's to Garland, 2 West Grove Park, Edinburgh 10.
sentences.cn: 爱丁堡10区, 二西格鲁园, 加兰收.

sentences.en: Judy Garland: He adores me and I need to be adored.
sentences.cn: 朱迪·兰: 他崇拜我并且我需要被崇拜.

sentences.en: Last year's sheddings from the tree do not form an attractive garland.
sentences.cn: 用去年的落叶是编不出美丽的花环的.

sentences.en: March 1 st, and the name is Mr. John Garland.
sentences.cn: 三月一日, 客人名字是约翰?格兰德.

sentences.en: Please tie this garland in here, thus the room looks better.
sentences.cn: 把这个花环系在这, 这样房间看上去好些.

sentences.en: She twined the flowers into a garland.
The company began developing a similar shopping center in Garland, Texas.
sentences.cn: 这家公司开始在德克萨斯州加尔兰市建造一家类似的购物中心.

sentences.en: The little girl presented the champion with a victory garland.
sentences.cn: 小女孩给冠军献上了胜利的花环.

sentences.en: The song Over the Rainbow was sung by Judy Garland.
sentences.cn: 《彩虹之上》这首歌是由朱迪·加伦演唱的.

sentences.en: They wore blue silk dresses with cream sashes and garlands of summer flowers in their hair.
sentences.cn: 她们穿着配有米色腰带的蓝色丝质连衣裙，头上戴着夏季的花儿编成的花环。

trans.tran_cn: 花环，花冠，花圈，[建]华饰，〈古〉诗歌选集，胜利和荣誉的象征
trans.tran_en: a ring of flowers or leaves, worn on your head or around your neck for decoration or for a special ceremony

trans.tran_cn: 戴花环，把…做成花环，给…饰以花环
